uhugo.download¶

uhugo.download.download_hugo_zip(version: str, os_type: str = None, download_to: str = None) → str[source]¶

Download the Hugo file to temp folder.

Parameters:

  • os_type – OS type

  • version – Version number to download

  • download_to – Path to download to
